articles.author: Monique Vanek
articles.title: Giant rate hike looms even as inflation slows - News24
articles.description: South African inflation decelerated for the first time since January, a slowdown that’s unlikely to sway the central bank from delivering an unprecedented second consecutive 75 basis-point hike in interest rates.

articles.title: Increase in home break-ins during longer load shedding periods - BusinessTech
articles.description: Load shedding, which is now almost a daily occurrence in South Africa, is more than just a major inconvenience – it’s a crime risk too and has resulted in an increase in home break-ins and vehicle accidents.

articles.title: Singer puts South African "twist" on a famous John Legend song - Jacaranda FM
articles.description:
The 'All Of Me' singer launched a #OpenVerseChallenge on TikTok allowing users to duet to his song 'Nervous'.
South African singer Mthandazo Gatya participated in the challenge and put his own unique South African twist on the song.
